document.full_text: marrying british small satellite expertise with florida's space launch industry should position both parties to capture a larger share of a global aerospace industry worth $250 billion a year, said uk trade delegates meeting in florida this week.
document.title: florida looks to lure foreign aerospace business
lines_and_colors: marrying british small satellite expertise with florida's space launch industry should position both parties to capture a larger share of a global aerospace industry worth $250 billion a year, said uk trade delegates meeting in florida this week.
